key_risks: Financial sustainability concerns due to reliance on external funding and lack of profitability
Operational challenges including charger reliability and maintenance issues
Regulatory and policy risks tied to government incentives and economic conditions
Intense competition from other EV charging networks
controversies: Customer complaints about charger reliability and availability
Dependence on government incentives and potential policy changes
environmental_issues: None significant; EVgo stations are powered by 100% renewable energy
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction due to operational inefficiencies
governance_issues: Reliance on government funding and potential regulatory shifts
